verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> To the chief Musician מַשְׂכִּ֥יל <WH4905> Maschil לִבְנֵי־ <WH1121> for the sons קֹֽרַח׃ <WH7141> of Korah כְּאַיָּ֗ל <WH354> As the hart תַּעֲרֹ֥ג <WH6165> panteth עַל־ <WH5921> and אֲפִֽיקֵי־ <WH650> brooks מָ֑יִם <WH4325> after the water כֵּ֤ן <WH3651> So נַפְשִׁ֨י <WH5315> my soul תַעֲרֹ֖ג <WH6165> so panteth אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> for אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> after thee O God

צָמְאָ֬ה <WH6770> thirsteth נַפְשִׁ֨י ׀ <WH5315> My soul לֵאלֹהִים֮ <WH430> for God לְאֵ֪ל <WH410> God חָ֥י <WH2416> for the living מָתַ֥י <WH4970> When אָב֑וֹא <WH935> when shall I come וְ֝אֵרָאֶ֗ה <WH7200> and appear פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> before אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> God

הָֽיְתָה־ <WH1961> have been לִּ֬י דִמְעָתִ֣י <WH1832> My tears לֶ֭חֶם <WH3899> have been my meat יוֹמָ֣ם <WH3119> day וָלָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> and night בֶּאֱמֹ֥ר <WH559> say אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> while they continually אַיֵּ֥ה <WH346> Where אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> angels

אֵ֤לֶּה <WH428> These אֶזְכְּרָ֨ה ׀ <WH2142> When I remember וְאֶשְׁפְּכָ֬ה <WH8210> these [things] I pour out עָלַ֨י ׀ <WH5921> within נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> my soul כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֶֽעֱבֹ֨ר ׀ <WH5674> in me for I had gone בַּסָּךְ֮ <WH5519> with the multitude אֶדַּדֵּ֗ם <WH1718> I went עַד־ <WH5704> against בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> with them to the house אֱלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> of God בְּקוֹל־ <WH6963> with the voice רִנָּ֥ה <WH7440> of joy וְתוֹדָ֗ה <WH8426> and praise הָמ֥וֹן <WH1995> with a multitude חוֹגֵֽג׃ <WH2287> that kept holyday

מַה־ <WH4100> Why תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י ׀ <WH7817> Why art thou cast down נַפְשִׁי֮ <WH5315> any וַתֶּהֱמִ֪י <WH1993> disturbed עָ֫לָ֥י <WH5921> within הוֹחִ֣ילִי <WH3176> in me? hope לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> thou in God כִּי־ <WH3588> for ע֥וֹד <WH5750> shall again אוֹדֶ֗נּוּ <WH3034> for I shall yet praise יְשׁוּע֥וֹת <WH3444> him [for] the help פָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> of his countenance

אֱ‍ֽלֹהַ֗י <WH430> O my God עָלַי֮ <WH5921> within נַפְשִׁ֪י <WH5315> my soul תִשְׁתּ֫וֹחָ֥ח <WH7817> is cast down עַל־ <WH5921> within כֵּ֗ן <WH3651> after that אֶ֭זְכָּרְךָ <WH2142> within me therefore will I remember מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> thee from the land יַרְדֵּ֑ן <WH3383> of Jordan וְ֝חֶרְמוֹנִ֗ים <WH2769> and of the Hermonites מֵהַ֥ר <WH2022> from the hill מִצְעָֽר׃ <WH4706> Mizar תְּהֽוֹם־ <WH8415> confusion אֶל־ <WH413> about

תְּה֣וֹם <WH8415> Deep ק֭וֹרֵא <WH7121> calleth לְק֣וֹל <WH6963> at the noise צִנּוֹרֶ֑יךָ <WH6794> of thy waterspouts כָּֽל־ <WH3605> All מִשְׁבָּרֶ֥יךָ <WH4867> all thy waves וְ֝גַלֶּ֗יךָ <WH1530> and thy billows עָלַ֥י <WH5921> over עָבָֽרוּ׃ <WH5674> are gone

יוֹמָ֤ם ׀ <WH3119> in the daytime יְצַוֶּ֬ה <WH6680> will command יְהוָ֨ה ׀ <WH3068> [Yet] the LORD חַסְדּ֗וֹ <WH2617> his lovingkindness וּ֭בַלַּיְלָה <WH3915> and in the night [שִׁירָהּ כ] (שִׁירֹ֣ו <WH7892> musical ק) עִמִּ֑י <WH5973> with תְּ֝פִלָּ֗ה <WH8605> [shall be] with me [and] my prayer לְאֵ֣ל <WH410> unto the God חַיָּֽי׃ <WH2416> of my life

אוֹמְרָ֤ה ׀ <WH559> I will say לְאֵ֥ל <WH410> unto God סַלְעִי֮ <WH5553> my rock לָמָ֪ה <WH4100> Why שְׁכַ֫חְתָּ֥נִי <WH7911> Why hast thou forgotten לָֽמָּה־ <WH4100> Why קֹדֵ֥ר <WH6937> I mourning אֵלֵ֗ךְ <WH1980> go בְּלַ֣חַץ <WH3906> because of the oppression אוֹיֵֽב׃ <WH341> of the enemy

בְּרֶ֤צַח ׀ <WH7524> [As] with a sword בְּֽעַצְמוֹתַ֗י <WH6106> in my bones חֵרְפ֥וּנִי <WH2778> reproach צוֹרְרָ֑י <WH6887> mine enemies בְּאָמְרָ֥ם <WH559> me while they say אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַ֝יּ֗וֹם <WH3117> daily אַיֵּ֥ה <WH346> Where אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> angels

מַה־ <WH4100> Why תִּשְׁתּ֬וֹחֲחִ֨י ׀ <WH7817> Why art thou cast down נַפְשִׁי֮ <WH5315> any וּֽמַה־ <WH4100> Why תֶּהֱמִ֪י <WH1993> become עָ֫לָ֥י <WH5921> within הוֹחִ֣ילִי <WH3176> within me? hope לֵֽ֭אלֹהִים <WH430> thou in God כִּי־ <WH3588> for ע֣וֹד <WH5750> shall yet אוֹדֶ֑נּוּ <WH3034> for I shall yet praise יְשׁוּעֹ֥ת <WH3444> him [who is] the health פָּ֝נַ֗י <WH6440> of my countenance וֵֽאלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> and my God
